ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: CPU Athlon 800 RAM 256MB Video Card/RAM Leadtek GTS 32MB Sound Card: SB:Live (never had a problem here either) HD Speed: 7200 RPM Net Speed 768K DSL Geographic
ygData.messageBody:
CPU Athlon 800
RAM 256MB
Video Card/RAM Leadtek GTS 32MB
Sound Card: SB:Live (never had a problem here either)
HD Speed: 7200 RPM
Net Speed 768K DSL
Geographic Location: Chicago
Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: enable
Particle Effects: enable
Mip Mapping: n/a (Unless I'm wrong - this is Glide Only)
Clip plane distance: Max

How many songs can you twist? 3 (too lazy to try for 4)
Do you slow down when it rains? Nope
How about in Unrest or Kunark? Nope

As you can see - with a top-of-the-line machine the game really rocks.
I built it myself; used an existing Soundcard and Monitor - and spent
exactly $1771.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 10:36 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance


To keep this whole concept on topic, I'd like to start a survey of system
specs vs. apparent performance.
Just fill in the blanks and let's share what works and what doesn't!

How many songs can you twist?
Do you slow down when it rains?
How about in Unrest or Kunark?
